houses.name: Lagna (Ascendant) / First House
houses.description: Represents self, personality, physical appearance, and overall life direction.
houses.nature: Kendra (center of strength) and Trikona (triangle of purpose). Influences personal growth, vitality, and leadership.

houses.name: Dhana Bhava / Second House
houses.description: Represents wealth, family, speech, and accumulated assets.
houses.nature: Artha (material prosperity). Governs financial stability, family relations, and value systems.

houses.name: Sahaj Bhava / Third House
houses.description: Represents courage, communication, younger siblings, and short journeys.
houses.nature: Upachaya (house of growth). Encourages self-expression, boldness, and skills development.

houses.name: Sukha Bhava / Fourth House
houses.description: Represents home, mother, inner peace, and emotional stability.
houses.nature: Kendra (pillar of support). Governs inner contentment, familial bonds, and real estate.

houses.name: Putra Bhava / Fifth House
houses.description: Represents creativity, children, education, and romance.
houses.nature: Trikona (triangle of purpose). Encourages creativity, intelligence, and joy in life.

houses.name: Shatru Bhava / Sixth House
houses.description: Represents challenges, enemies, health issues, and debts.
houses.nature: Upachaya (house of growth). Challenges to overcome, fostering discipline and resilience.

houses.name: Yuvati Bhava / Seventh House
houses.nature: Kendra (pillar of support). Reflects harmony, alliances, and cooperative ventures.

houses.name: Mrityu Bhava / Eighth House
houses.description: Represents transformations, longevity, secrets, and occult sciences.
houses.nature: Dusthana (house of hardship). Governs transformation, research, and hidden knowledge.

houses.name: Dharma Bhava / Ninth House
houses.description: Represents spirituality, higher learning, and luck.
houses.nature: Trikona (triangle of purpose). Inspires wisdom, moral values, and divine connection.

houses.name: Karma Bhava / Tenth House
houses.description: Represents career, reputation, and public image.
houses.nature: Kendra (pillar of support) and Upachaya (house of growth). Reflects ambitions, success, and recognition.

houses.name: Labha Bhava / Eleventh House
houses.description: Represents gains, social circles, and aspirations.
houses.nature: Upachaya (house of growth). Governs wealth accumulation, social networks, and goals.

houses.name: Vyaya Bhava / Twelfth House
houses.description: Represents losses, spirituality, isolation, and foreign connections.
houses.nature: Dusthana (house of hardship). Reflects detachment, spiritual evolution, and letting go.
